skills.title: Webflow Development Skills
skills.description: Skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Proficient in building web applications using Node.js and Express. Well-versed in React and Vue.js for frontend development. Capable of working with API's (REST & JSON). Experienced in both frontend and backend framework development. Equipped for full-stack development, especially with the MERN stack.

skills.title: Other Programming Skills
skills.description: Adept in Java and C++ programming languages. Developed a stock prediction software in C++. Possess a strong understanding of MySQL and Git for database and version control.

skills.title: Industry Skills
skills.description: Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Skilled in ChatGPT prompt engineering. Proficient in leveraging AI tools for efficiency and automation.

skills.title: Analytical Skills
skills.description: Competent in data analysis using Matlab, Python, pandas, numpy, and matplotlib. Experienced in machine learning with Scikit-Learn. Proficient in using Jupyter Notebook for data analysis and visualization. Capable of web scraping techniques.

portfolio.title: Book store website backend-fronted
portfolio.description: Build full website using node, express and MySql | learnt how to provide and call APIs,  password hashing, authorisation, form sanitisation and validation

portfolio.title: Flappy bird game
portfolio.description: Build full flappy bird point game using P5.js | learnt how to write game logic in object oriented methodology using constructor functions

portfolio.title: Frontend sports website from scratch
portfolio.description: Build news sharing website from scratch without using framework | HTML, CSS, Javascript | learnt how to make CSS  animations and hard coded javascript functions using “script” tag , also how to optimizable according to mobile, tablet and laptop screen size

portfolio.title: Music visualizer software
portfolio.description: Shows 6 different types graphics when music is played | learnt how to use P5.JS javascript library

portfolio.title: Music disk player in C++
portfolio.description: Build music player to load songs and to equalize songs | learnt how to use Juce library in C++

portfolio.title: Mario game
portfolio.description: Build a working 2D game from scratch | learnt the basic game concepts in P5.JS
